translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Paṇṇadāyaka
And while I was sitting there,
the Great Seer came to me.
Siddhattha, the Light of the World,
the one who heals the whole world,
while he was sitting on a leaf-seat.
I didn’t go to the lower realms,🔽because of the leaf I gave then:
this is the fruit of giving a leaf.
the six super-knowledges have been realized.
I have fulfilled the Buddha’s instructions.”🔽Thus the Elder Paṇṇadāyaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā paṇṇadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Paṇṇadāyakattherassāpadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā paṇṇadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽paṇṇadāyaka therassa apadānam paṭhama
